overview: The Cisco Kid rides again! This time, he robs a bank to save pretty widow Sally Benton and her ranch. After developing a good relationship with Sallyâ€™s children, he risks life and limb in order to save her little one.
tagline: Meet "The CISCO KID" Gay Cavalier...chivalrous bandit...plaguing the rich...helping the poor...always enamoured...never in love.
title: The Cisco Kid
